liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

command.label: Command
command.tooltip: Name of the command (The user must write this in the chat)

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command, who can use this command

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on global cooldown for $cd minutes!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd minutes!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

TooMuch.label: Too Much Message
TooMuch.tooltip: The message what will be send when a user give too many names with the command

FirstMessage.value: The following users must pick the following hero!
FirstMessage.label: First Message

response.value: $user you have only $points $currency to flip the coin.
response.label: Response Message
response.tooltip: Message that will be posted as result
